original_text: But people will never ask Christ to help them if they have not believed in him. And they will never believe in him if they have not heard about him. And they will not hear about him unless somebody tells God's message to them. But people will never ask Christ to help them if they have not believed in him. And they will never believe in him if they have not heard about him. And they will not hear about him unless somebody tells God's message to them.
korean_text: 그런즉 그들이 믿지 아니하는 이를 어찌 부르리요 듣지도 못한 이를 어찌 믿으리요 전파하는 자가 없이 어찌 들으리요

sentences.original_text: But people will never ask Christ to help them
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 사람들은 그리스도께 도움을 청하지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: if they have not believed in him
And they will never believe in him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그를 결코 믿지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: if they have not heard about him
And they will not hear about him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그에 대해 듣지 못할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: unless somebody tells God's message to them
sentences.korean_translation: 누군가 그들에게 하나님의 메시지를 전하지 않는다면

sentences.original_text: But people will never ask Christ to help them
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 사람들은 그리스도께 도움을 청하지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: if they have not believed in him
And they will never believe in him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그를 결코 믿지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: if they have not heard about him
And they will not hear about him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그에 대해 듣지 못할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: unless somebody tells God's message to them
sentences.korean_translation: 누군가 그들에게 하나님의 메시지를 전하지 않는다면
